# `usage help generate completion`

- **Usage**: `usage help generate completion`
- **Source code**: [`cli/src/cli/help/generate/completion.rs`](https://github.com/jdx/usage/blob/main/cli/src/cli/help/generate/completion.rs)

Generate shell completion scripts for bash, fish, powershell, or zsh
